full_text: METROPOLITAN CORRECTIONAL CENTER NEW YORK JEFFREY, EPSTEIN REG. NO. 76318-054 PHOTOGRAPHS TAKEN 8-10-19

text_blocks.content: JEFFREY, EPSTEIN REG. NO. 76318-054 PHOTOGRAPHS TAKEN 8-10-19

additional_notes: The document appears to be a record of photographs taken of Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The document includes the Federal Bureau of Prisons logo and a unique registration number for Epstein.
